بمناسبة تعويم الجنية واختلاف اسعار العملات في البنوك المختلفه وان في ناس كتير بتحب تتابع اسعار العملات اول بآول وبدل ما يقعدوا يدرورا علي مواقع البنوك عملت موقع بسيط بيجيب اسعار العملات اوتوماتيكيا من مواقع ٤ بنوك مبدئيا وجاري اضافة بنوك اخري قريبا.
الموقع بيتحدث اول بآول بالاسعار الي في مواقع البنوك يعني مفيش اي تآخير في الاسعار والاسعار المكتوبة في الاسعار الفعليه واللحظية في المواقع.
www.egp-price.com
احفظوة .. هتحتاجوه ;)

*تعديل: تم اضافة البنك المركزي المصري ليكون المجموع ٥ بنوك

What kind of knowledge needed or what should I know to build a monitoring system?
This system should do the following:
1. Real time employee' computer monitoring.
2. Manager computer must have an access to employees' computers.
3. Block specific web sites (ex. YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, online shopping web, and other messenger programs for chat conversation).
4. Multiple employees' screens need to be on manager's screen.
5. Need to provide a screenshot automatically as every second, or minute for a manager, when he/she wants to look. All the screenshots needs to save to the main server with time stamp.
6. Tracking service that a manager can check how much employees have spent their time for.
7. Tracking service what employees get download, upload, or moving files to portable device (USB, Portable hard disk).
8. Employees must not have access, or delete the program by themselves (Key code).
9. Website visited.
10. Block games.
11. Block apps.
12. Block music players.

I got these specs from a project posted in freelance.com, and I am very curious to learn how to build such thing.

So please anyone has the knowledge on how can I start in this direction, I will be very happy.

You can provide me with the name of subjects to study and why to study it.

Thanks,

just saw a previous post about fraud jobs and among the comments i saw a comment from Mohamed Alaa El Din and another member talking a bout building a review platform for the tech companies in Egypt (as fraud tech jobs are a phenomenon in the time being). I thought i might be a page where people can send their reviews and evidence to the fraud case (might be screenshots or even documents) and the admins post those reviews when they make sure of a real fraud case. I've created a facebook page before. I wish to have some trusted people like the admins of Egyption geeks that can make sure of the posted content.

so guys what do you think? cc Ahmad Alfy

https://www.facebook.com/techno.com.review/
posts.description: Techno review is a page where you can send us the review of a tech company where you've worked at/with and we will share it anonymously to help others.

رجالة ال javascript اللي جربت ECMA script 6 و angular 2 
1-هل فيه داعي اني اتعلمهم و انقل شغلي ليهم ولا الفرق ما بينهم مش محتاج التعب ده كله؟
2-خدت وقت قد إيه عشان تبقى في نفس ال Level بعد ما نقلت ؟ 
3- عشان تنقل angular application كبير وفيه شغل 4 شهور ل angular 2 ممكن ياخد وقت قد إيه ؟ (من غير وقت مذاكرة angular 2)
